body:
<!-- Thanks for filing an issue! Before hitting the button, please answer these questions.-->

**Is this a request for help?** (If yes, you should use our troubleshooting guide and community support channels, see http://kubernetes.io/docs/troubleshooting/.): no

**What keywords did you search in Kubernetes issues before filing this one?** (If you have found any duplicates, you should instead reply there.): "more than its spec" "is invalid"

---

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one): BUG REPORT

<!--
If this is a BUG REPORT, please:
  - Fill in as much of the template below as you can.  If you leave out
    information, we can't help you as well.

If this is a FEATURE REQUEST, please:
  - Describe *in detail* the feature/behavior/change you'd like to see.

In both cases, be ready for followup questions, and please respond in a timely
manner.  If we can't reproduce a bug or think a feature already exists, we
might close your issue.  If we're wrong, PLEASE feel free to reopen it and
explain why.
-->

**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):

```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4", GitVersion:"v1.4.0", GitCommit:"a16c0a7f71a6f93c7e0f222d961f4675cd97a46b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2016-09-26T18:16:57Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"4", GitVersion:"v1.4.0+coreos.0", GitCommit:"278a1f7034bdba61cba443722647da1a8204a6fc", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2016-09-26T20:48:37Z", GoVersion:"go1.6.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

**Environment**:
- **Cloud provider or hardware configuration**: AWS
- **OS** (e.g. from /etc/os-release): CoreOS 1122.2.0
- **Kernel** (e.g. `uname -a`): 4.7.0-coreos
- **Install tools**: bootkube
- **Others**:

**What happened**:
I've got 4 copies of pods for several deployments, though the replicas field is set to 3

```
NAME                                      READY     STATUS    RESTARTS   AGE
kube-controller-manager-237587340-epcni   1/1       Running   2          10h
kube-controller-manager-237587340-gtxil   1/1       Running   21         1d
kube-controller-manager-237587340-i396r   1/1       Running   2          2h
kube-controller-manager-237587340-u553o   1/1       Running   4          6h
```

**What you expected to happen**:
For it to only have 3 pods

**How to reproduce it** (as minimally and precisely as possible):
Unknown

**Anything else do we need to know**:
Deployment, pods, and logs attached

[logs.txt](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/files/501273/logs.txt)
[pods.yaml.txt](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/files/501276/pods.yaml.txt)
[deployment.yaml.txt](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/files/501275/deployment.yaml.txt)

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Apps.
labels.name: sig/apps

title: kube-controller-manager fails to remove extra pods from a deployment
